downloadTitle: MSDN Success Builder Module 3-006: Writing Customer-Driven Documentation
downloadDescription: Developer training materials for the Success Builder program from MSDN.
detailsSection: Ways for developers to acquire a competitive edge by documenting product features in the context of customer needs and workflow. Includes references to Microsoft case studies and practical tips for increasing satisfaction with documentation. 1 section. 10 minutes.
installInstructionSection: To use the course materials unzip the archive file and extract the included documents to a location on your hard drive.
